message: Significant high-performance infrastructure already exists - comprehensive async pipeline with bulk operations, connection pooling, and monitoring
Critical performance bottleneck: Individual parameter reads instead of bulk Modbus operations

data.current_implementation: Each parameter read triggers separate Modbus TCP request
data.performance_impact: 50+ individual requests per second vs potential single bulk request
data.optimization_target: Implement bulk address range reads for contiguous parameters
data.expected_improvement: 10x-20x performance gain from 500ms to 50ms for 50 parameters
